extendedInfo.description: Stargazer, a new educational game for kids and fun casual entertainment for adults, is now available for Android and Facebook users. With Stargazer, all generations can develop their imagination, improve their spatial reasoning and have lots of fun! Have you ever found yourself watching the starry sky, seeing elaborate shapes and figures, or wishing you could recognize the constellations others talk about? Take a journey with our stargazers as they try to find their way home through numerous levels of the game by solving the puzzles and building new constellations.Combining unique 3D graphics, challenging levels, and bright colorful visuals, Stargazer is one of the most original and fun-filled games on the Android market.We love feedback! If you have ideas to further improve the game and make it even more enjoyable for you, drop us a line at support@finiklabs.com - we will do our best to incorporate your suggestions into future updates.Like us on facebook and leave your feedback:http://www.facebook.com/stargazergameor play onlinehttp://apps.facebook.com/stargazergame

reviews.title: Love
reviews.comment: This game is so much fun IM personally going to fall in love with it. I have kids and if you want them to be busy hear you go . Kisses ....... :-*
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Finished all levels, it was really fun! Now when I look up the night sky I think of this cute game and try to guess what hides behind the stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very addictive!
reviews.comment: Great way to spend time while waiting for a doctor\'s appointment or when you have a coffee break at work. The game is challenging enough to give your brain that 15 minute a day exercise - something that makes this game stand out comparing to many other games that are available these days. The shapes are fun everyday objects, but it took me some time to figure out some of them. My next challenge is to at attempt the \"hard\" difficulty level, which looks quite interesting with those half lines.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome game, had to buy the full version
reviews.comment: Highly recommended, easy and casual but highly addictive :) I am writing this after buying the full version, the game was so much fun I just had to get the paid version with more levels. Excellent time killer, now every time I am bored I just take my phone out of my pocket and \"rotate the shapes\" :) I like that you can play it with one hand, that is something that is impossible to do with many games today. \"Hard\" difficulty level is a bit challenging, but I think I finally got it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Its not just for kids... Really nice;-) i took me a time to complite a few levels;-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very addictive.
reviews.comment: Could not stop until finished all levels.

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Only played hard levels and really enjoyed it. Music is absolutely awful. Should be more relaxing. Thats the only fault
